passive.name: Cotton Down
passive.description: When Eldegoss has been damaged over a certain value, cotton will burst, which will increase Eldegoss’ movement speed and regain some health.

basic attack.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, attaching cotton to the Pokémon. If you use a basic attack on a Pokémon with cotton, the damage will increase and their movement speed will be reduced.

base.name: Leafage
base.description: Pelts the target with leaves, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when it hits.

upgrade.description: In addition, while a Pollen Puff is attached to them, opposing Pokemon receive damage over time and ally Pokemon receive less damage.

upgrades.name: Pollen Puff
upgrades.description: Throws a Pollen Puff, which attaches to a Pokemon. The Pollen Puff restores HP for ally Pokemon and deals damage to opposing Pokemon.

upgrade.description: Decreases the accuracy of opposing Pokemon when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Leaf Tornado
upgrades.description: Attacks with a tornado of sharp leaves, leaving a path in its wake that increases ally Pokemon's movement speed for a short time.

base.name: Synthesis
base.description: Restores the HP of the user and nearby ally Pokemon.

upgrade.description: Increases the user's movement speed while using this move.

upgrades.name: Cotton Guard
upgrades.description: Protects the user and nearby ally Pokemon with cotton. The cotton absorbs damage, and when the move ends, the cotton restores some HP.

upgrade.description: Also throws opposing Pokemon when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Cotton Spore
upgrades.description: Gathers spores around the user that reduce damage received. The spores burst after a short time, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time.

unite.name: Cotton Cloud Crash
unite.description: Has the user float into the air and become invincible. If used again, has the user pound the ground, attacking and {{shoving|knockback}} opposing Pokemon and restoring HP to ally Pokemon in the area of effect.
